original_text: He caught a young man of Sukkoth and questioned him, and the young man wrote down for him the names of the seventy-seven officials of Sukkoth, the elders of the town.
korean_text: 숙곳 사람 중 한 소년을 잡아 그를 심문하매 그가 숙곳의 방백들과 장로들 칠십칠 명을 그에게 적어 준지라

sentences.original_text: He caught a young man of Sukkoth
and the young man wrote down for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 그 청년은 그를 위해 적어주었다

sentences.original_text: the names of the seventy-seven officials of Sukkoth
